original_title: Can't Beat This Place For Fun
overview: This film is a small vignette of Fretwater Boatworks, a very unique boat crafting shop that keeps the tradition of wooden dory building alive whilst honoring the dreams of Grand Canyon pioneer Martin Litton. These beautiful boats still represent advocacy toward wild places compromised and/or lost.

production_companies.name: Dawn Kish Photo and Film LLC

title: Can't Beat This Place For Fun
